With Resi-Cost you no longer have to guess your home's cost using rules of thumb like construction cost per square foot. Resi-Cost provides you an economical, simple, fast and accurate way to budget your home's design, built in your specific location with your material selections. The challenge with using cost per square foot as a way to budget a home is that cost per square foot excludes* the following factors: 1  Excludes land cost, site development costs such as drives, utilities, clearing, decks, patios, landscape or any fees or permitting costs. 2  Excludes excavation. 3  Excludes basement costs.
